item.title: HELP PLEASE. [DOUBLE HITTING DDS SPECIAL reward]
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“wales 00, post:7, topic:137061”]lmfao!
add this as void…

public void calculateSpecial() { if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {//dagger startAnimation(1068); specialDamage = 14 + misc.random(6); specialDamage2 = 14 + misc.random(6); if (DoubleHit == true) { specialAmount -= 25; } }
and dont say that dont work because i know it does…[/quote]

You mean method, not void, and he wants the graphics to face the way he is, and that’s not how. Learn to read.

Read full topic
